TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicEndpoint extends System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint

Docs.summary: An endpoint that uses WS-Discovery to find the endpoint address dynamically at runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you use a DynamicEndpoint a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> is added to the binding you specify in the DynamicEndpoint constructor if not already present. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> property enables you to describe the service you want to use. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> used by the DynamicEndpoint override these values specified in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription contract, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>.
Gets or sets an object that provides a discovery endpoint.
Gets or sets the used to search for a service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria> is used to describe the service to call.
